title: Exchange Tickets for a Different Day
description: A theater patron wants to exchange their tickets for Tuesday's performance to Wednesday's performance of the same show.

tasks.description: Look up the patron's original order for Tuesday's show.
Check for availability of comparable seats for Wednesday's performance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds comparable seats are available.

tasks.description: Process the exchange in the ticketing system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent voids the Tuesday tickets and issues new tickets for Wednesday.

tasks.description: Email the new tickets for Wednesday's performance to the patron.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends the new digital tickets.
